version_description:
• FULLY UPDATED for the 2021 MLB Season!
• KEEP YOUR ALL-STAR LEVELS – Get a head start by carrying over your ALL-STAR LEVELS from TSB20 FREE!
• NEW EVENT: CLUB RALLY – Work together with your Club to win HUGE rewards!
• NEW MODE: PITCHING! – Throw the HEAT for the first time in TSB history! Stay tuned for more PITCHING content!
• WORLD RANKING SEASONS – Assert your dominance and win season rewards!
• BE AN X-FACTOR – Equip an X-FACTOR SKILL to your CUSTOM LEGEND!
• STREAMLINED UI – PRE & POST GAME screens have been re-worked to get you in-and-out of games faster!
• CURRENCY BOOST – Earn more with this new ACCOLADE!
• PUSH FOR THE PLAYOFFS – Winning Prime Events games now count!
• Bug fixes and other improvements to game performance

• New PAYOFF PITCH Club Event! Paint the corners and dominate the strike zone!
• NEW PLAYER LOGIN GIFT each day! It’s never too late to get in the game!
• Big updates to CLUB RALLY Events!
• Get stronger than ever with new SKILL MULTIPLIERS and TIERS!
• New ALL STAR BUFFS and SUBSCRIPTION PERKS!
• VISUAL UPDATES to Club Profiles and Pre-Game matchup screens
• Bug fixes and general improvements to game performance
